process-def.name: :AutoPilot-OA-Configuration_Management:Searches:Get Configuration Item by Configuration Item ID

input.description:
String Value - The name of a configuration item defined in a configuration module.
Valid Values: BMC_AR_System, BMC_Atrium

String Value - class name
BMC_AR_System and BMC_Atrium
Valid Values:
BMC_Account BMC_Activity BMC_AdminDomain BMC_ApplicationService BMC_ApplicationSystem BMC_BusinessService BMC_Cluster BMC_ConnectivityCollection BMC_Database BMC_Document BMC_Equipment BMC_HarwareSystemComponent BMC_LogicalSystemComponent BMC_Organization BMC_ProtocolEndpoint BMC_Role BMC_UserCommunity

String Value - Instance ID to query.
Example: AS0050560C63F2rpytRAn_CoAAWI0A

The query item is an XML document that is required by CiscoWorks LMS and Remedy CMDB. CiscoWorks LMS: The query item is an XML document that may include one or more query mapping elements along with the concept "type" element that must contain the CiscoWorks LMS "item-type" element value. Valid Values for item-type (ie. concept "type") are: NetConfig Job Identifies the type of the item as being a NetConfig Job. NetShow Job Identifies the type of the item as being a NetShow Job. Device Configuration Identifies the type of the item as being a Device Configuration. Device Inventory Identifies the type of the item as being a Device Inventory. XML Document for query item: <item> <type/> <id/> <name/> <input/> <view/> <ip-address/> <debug-level/> <email/> <filename/> <hop/> <log-file/> </item>
Remedy CMDB: The query item is an XML document that may include parameters that are used to refine and control queries. The following is an example that include default values: <query-item> <soap> <username /> <password /> </soap> <login-info> <user-id>Demo</user-id> <password>Demo</password> <lang>English</lang> </login-info> <class-name-id> <namespace-name>BMC.CORE</namespace-name> <class-name>BMC_ComputerSystem</class-name> </class-name-id> <dataset-id>BMC.ASSET</dataset-id> <get-mask>GET_MASK_NONE</get-mask> <first-retrieve>0</first-retrieve> <max-retrieve>0</max-retrieve> <sort-by>SerialNumber</sort-by> <sort-order>ASCENDING</sort-order> </query-item>

output.description: An XML document providing detail for one or more configuration items.

String Value - Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully.
Valid values: success, failure
String Value - A process specific string that explains the value of success status.

documentation.description:
This workflow finds all configuration items by instance id.
This workflow is not supported by HP ServiceCenter.
